oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-03-21 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 21, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Billy Walker, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1015th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Porter Wagoner; Don Warden; Red Gale; Jordanaires; Billy Walker; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Porter Wagoner -- Me And Fred And Joe And Bill (Porter Wagoner, Don Warden, Red Gale) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces the Jordanaires -- When I Move (Jordanaires) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Billy Walker -- Mr. Heartache (Billy Walker) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Grey Eagle (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Porter Wagoner talks -- Lord I'm Coming Home (Porter Wagoner, Jordanaires) -- Porter Wagoner and Grant Turner introduce Chet Atkins -- Show Me The Way To Go Home (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Wagoner, Porter; Warden, Don, 1929-; Gale, Red; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006
